overview: On a road trip to visit their parents, Ben and Helena get pulled over by a shambling,quiet police officer. When Helena is bit, they have a dilemma: When the cops turn to zombies, who do you turn to for help? Shot in black and white and set against the stark backdrop of the Santa Clarita mountains, Zombie Cops is a thrilling adventure packed with scares and laughs in equal measure.
title: Zombie Cops
